Title: The Lonely Guy
Writer: Ed. Weinberger (screenplay), Stan Daniels (screenplay), Neil Simon (adaptation), Bruce Jay Friedman (book)
Actors: Steve Martin, Charles Grodin, Judith Ivey, Steve Lawrence
Plot: When shy Larry Hubbard finds his girlfriend in bed with another man he is forced to begin a new life as single. But since he can't bear being on his own he tries to court Iris who is not however interested in him. Larry begins writing a book on his experience as a single which unexpectedly becomes a best seller. He becomes rich and famous and even his relationship with Iris can begin on a new basis.
